content: {"name": "Lifestream Church of the Nazarene Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "We affirm the sacredness and dignity of all human life. . We offer dignity and respect to those we serve. . We expect uncompromising integrity in all we do. . We pledge service to those in need regardless of background, belief or circumstance. . We strive to alleviate hunger through the gathering and distribution of food while encouraging self-sufficiency, collaboration, advocacy and education.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "5105 Leonardtown Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Waldorf", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20601", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.58501, "longitude": -76.86274}, "phones": [{"number": "(301) 645-8249", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Open to all"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
